sentences.sContent: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.sContent: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.sCn: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

phrases.pCn: 作为…的报酬；作为…的回报

words.tran: 有益的，值得的；有报酬的，报答的

remMethod.val: re ＋ ward(看作word， 话语) → 再次发话给予奖赏 → 奖赏

trans.tranOther: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked for it
